group_1.narration: "Hey, did you catch today's online news?"
"Is this what you mean? The bizarre fluctuation in@crime rates occurring in Yukuni City?"
"Really, it's been ages since such good news@has come along."

group_1.textCenter: Now that the blackboard is clean, new writing@will be much easier to read.
(...This feels just like when we defeated the Witch.)
(I'm trying to reset my past relationships and@start over...)
I would be glad if they could understand us better...
Wait, was it okay to erase the music score from@the blackboard...?

group_1.textRight: I didn't ask you to clean, but you still did a good job.

group_1.textLeft: Don't you find that club activities are more@enjoyable when everything looks nice?

group_1.textRight: Even now, when everyone's talking about how@Magical Girls aren't so bad,
she still hasn't uttered a word against those of us@who used her...

group_1.textLeft: If I were to learn that Magical Girls were killing@people as Witches,
I'd naturally feel angry and scared...

group_1.textRight: ...I don't expect forgiveness, but let me say it.
I'm sorry, Kurusu, for all the terrible things I did...

group_1.textLeft: ...If there's anything I truly can't forgive,
it's that you tried to involve Sensei who didn't@have anything to do with it.
And I don't plan on forgiving you both just like that.

group_1.textRight: Alright, if that's what you think we really did...

group_1.textLeft: If we're going to reconcile, it'll have to be after all@of this is over.
So, until we finish defeating the Witches and@Yukuni City's peace improves...

group_1.textCenter: (It's frightening to be so poorly received...)
(If we fail in the end, even harsher repercussions@will be waiting for us...)
(Let's use this as motivation to push a little harder,@Sasha...!)
At the moment, we can detect only two Witches@remaining.
And with the Witches we have defeated thus far,@public safety has already been improving.
The outcome depends on the numbers shown.@Let's finish this by joining forces.

group_1.textLeft: However, as expected of the last Witches standing,
though we can't gauge from their reactions alone,@the two of them might be quite formidable.

group_1.textRight: In that case, the groups should be...

group_1.textCenter: you three seem like a good match.

group_1.textRight: It's true that the three of us are used to fighting@as a trio,
so it's easy for us to coordinate, but...

group_1.textCenter: Are you really sure you'll be okay with just the@three of you?

group_1.textRight: If you're aiming for a sure victory, I believe these@combinations are the best.

group_1.textLeft: Having six people would be nice...

group_1.textRight: You can sense the Witches moving, can't you?

group_1.textLeft: Certainly, both of them seem to be moving briskly.

group_1.textRight: Considering the potential danger if we leave@them unchecked,
we must split into groups of three and take them@down simultaneously.
...We can't afford to fail here and start all over@from scratch.
